description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Online deathmatch with big robots, featuring huge explosions in your typical fully destructible blocky world. Also supports CPU opponents for offline training.
description.short: Online deathmatch with big robots, featuring huge explosions in your typical fully destructible blocky world. Also supports CPU opponents for offline training.
